Fall_River.John Brown IV House: The John Brown IV House is a historic colonial house at 703 Pearse Road in Swansea, Massachusetts. It is a 2-1/2 story wood frame structure, five bays wide, clapboard siding, and a gambrel roof pierced by two gabled dormers. An enclosed entrance portico projects at the center of the main facade, and ells extend the house to the rear.
